message.content:
cs.LG, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.DC

This paper proposes a runtime memory manager for deep neural networks (DNNs) to utilize both GPU and CPU memory simultaneously, reducing the memory requirements of DNNs. The paper focuses on the memory efficiency of DNNs, which is a common concern in the fields of machine learning and computer vision. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Additionally, since the paper proposes a new method for optimizing the memory usage of DNNs, it may also be relevant to the sub-categories cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing).
